docblock.long-description: You can decide that the ouput will be sorted by the description. If not the output will be sorted by the language-code.
You can exclude a blog explicitly. All your settings will be safe but the plugin will ignore this blog while this option is active.

docblock.description: Show only a link if a translation is available
docblock.long-description: Some user requested this feature. Shows only links to available translations.

docblock.description: Show a link to the current blog
docblock.long-description: Some user requested this feature. If active the plugin will place also a link to the current blog.

docblock.description: The description for the current blog
docblock.long-description: The language will be used ff there is no description.

The output can be placed after the_content

docblock.long-description: Default is 10. But may be there are other plugins active and you run into trouble. So you can decide a higher (from 1) or a lower (to 100) priority for the output

docblock.long-description:
$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$obj->test = 'This is just a test';
echo $obj->test;

docblock.description: An array as a generic container for all vars

docblock.long-description:
$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$obj->temp = 'test';
$obj->reset();
$val = $obj->get_arr(); // array() == $val

docblock.description: Check if the array has an non empty item with the specified key
docblock.long-description:
$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$val = $obj->has_value( 'temp' ); // false == $val
$obj->temp = 'test';
$val = $obj->has_value( 'temp' ); // true == $val

docblock.description: Check if the array is empty
docblock.long-description:
$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$val = $obj->is_empty(); // true == $val
$obj->temp = 'test';
$val = $obj->is_empty(); // false == $val

$obj = new MslsGetSet;
$obj->temp = 'test';
$val = $obj->get_arr(); // array( 'temp' => 'test' ) == $val
